programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When Pride is spotted tracking one of Mayor Hamilton's accomplices on a crowded street, the suspect opens fire, putting innocent lives at risk before disappearing.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Unable to trust anyone in New Orleans, the NCIS team calls in FBI Assistant Director Isler to help expose and stop Mayor Hamilton's sinister scheme.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: While Pride remains on probation after his rogue takedown of the corrupt Mayor Hamilton, his team is closely monitored by a strict supervisor; the team must secretly investigate after the FBI takes the lead on a case involving stolen nuclear waste.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: An erratic whistleblower who calls Pride her mentor kidnaps him to help her locate a serial killer targeting young women in the Gulf of Mexico.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team joins forces with FBI Director Isler after a Russian operative with intelligence on sleeper agents disappears; Tammy partners with former sleeper agent Eva Azarova to assist in the disappearance.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A body found in a WWII-era motor car initially appears to be a suicide, but evidence suggests he was struck on the head before he died; Police search for the man's girlfriend.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The village's past hides the truth when a photographer is found dead.

programme.desc: After returning from war, Horatio's son seeks his help to solve a murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team splits up to investigate three different murders during spring break.

programme.desc: A murder victim's spirit won't leave Calleigh alone until she solves his case.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A jewelry heist ends in murder; Delko returns to find the culprit when evidence is stolen from the lab.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a suburban mother is murdered, the CSIs uncover her family's dark past; Delko continues his undercover mission.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team investigates its own department when Horatio's ex-girlfriend is killed in an explosion.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves cryptic hints and dead bodies for the team.

programme.desc: The team loses one of its own when a psychotic genius runs wild in Miami.

programme.desc: When a woman is murdered at an exclusive club, Horatio must search through an elite guest list to find the killer.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a girl is kidnapped, the only witness to the crime is a blind man who heard the kidnapping; his report leads the team to a suspect who is already in prison.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When the man who killed Horatio's wife breaks out of prison and goes on a rampage, the team tries to determine what he is after.

programme.desc: When a man claims to have dreamed of a murder before it happened, Horatio sends Natalia under cover to investigate him.

programme.desc: When a reality TV star is murdered, the CSIs investigate the show's cast, the obsessed fans, and the stars' hidden pasts.

programme.desc: The CSIs try to determine who is after a fisherman after he narrowly escapes death.
